title: Manual BOM
description: A standalone, one-off Bill of Materials, often for service or a quick quote. Supports versioning.

bomId.description: A unique identifier for this BOM (e.g., BOM-20251103-01).

name.description: A human-readable name (e.g., 'Big Grove Service Call BOM').

version.description: The version number for this BOM.

parentId.description: If this is a new version, this ID links to the original BOM.

createdAt.description: ISO timestamp of when this BOM version was created.

assemblies.description: A list of assembly 'kits' included in this BOM.

components.description: A list of one-off components added to this BOM.

costData.description: A snapshot of the costing data at the time of save.
